verses.verse: וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> Then came בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> of Israel כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָ֨עֵדָ֤ה <WH5712> [even] the whole congregation מִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> into the desert צִן֙ <WH6790> of Zin בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> in the first וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> abode הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and the people בְּקָדֵ֑שׁ <WH6946> in Kadesh וַתָּ֤מָת <WH4191> died שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there מִרְיָ֔ם <WH4813> and Miriam וַתִּקָּבֵ֖ר <WH6912> there and was buried שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no הָ֥יָה <WH1961> become מַ֖יִם <WH4325> And there was no water לָעֵדָ֑ה <WH5712> for the congregation וַיִּקָּ֣הֲל֔וּ <WH6950> and they gathered עַל־ <WH5921> against מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> themselves together against Moses וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> against אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> and against Aaron

וַיָּ֥רֶב <WH7378> chode הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And the people עִם־ <WH5973> with מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> with Moses וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and spake לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying וְל֥וּ <WH3863> Would God that גָוַ֛עְנוּ <WH1478> we had died בִּגְוַ֥ע <WH1478> died אַחֵ֖ינוּ <WH251> when our brethren לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְלָמָ֤ה <WH4100> Why הֲבֵאתֶם֙ <WH935> And why have ye brought up אֶת־ <WH853> קְהַ֣ל <WH6951> the congregation יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> into this wilderness הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this לָמ֣וּת <WH4191> should die שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> in it אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <WH587> we וּבְעִירֵֽנוּ׃ <WH1165> that we and our cattle

וְלָמָ֤ה <WH4100> Why הֶֽעֱלִיתֻ֙נוּ֙ <WH5927> And wherefore have ye made us to come up מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt לְהָבִ֣יא <WH935> to bring אֹתָ֔נוּ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> country הָרָ֖ע <WH7451> us in unto this evil הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this לֹ֣א ׀ <WH3808> not מְק֣וֹם <WH4725> country זֶ֗רַע <WH2233> of seed וּתְאֵנָ֤ה <WH8384> or of figs וְגֶ֙פֶן֙ <WH1612> or of vines וְרִמּ֔וֹן <WH7416> or of pomegranates וּמַ֥יִם <WH4325> neither [is] there any water אַ֖יִן <WH369> nor לִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <WH8354> to drink

וַיָּבֹא֩ <WH935> went מֹשֶׁ֨ה <WH4872> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> and Aaron מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> from the presence הַקָּהָ֗ל <WH6951> of the assembly אֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֙תַח֙ <WH6607> unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <WH5307> and they fell עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> upon their faces וַיֵּרָ֥א <WH7200> appeared כְבוֹד־ <WH3519> and the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH413> about פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

קַ֣ח <WH3947> Take אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּטֶּ֗ה <WH4294> the rod וְהַקְהֵ֤ל <WH6950> and gather אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֵדָה֙ <WH5712> thou the assembly אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you וְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> together thou and Aaron אָחִ֔יךָ <WH251> thy brother וְדִבַּרְתֶּ֧ם <WH1696> and speak אֶל־ <WH413> to הַסֶּ֛לַע <WH5553> ye unto the rock לְעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5869> before their eyes וְנָתַ֣ן <WH5414> and it shall give forth מֵימָ֑יו <WH4325> his water וְהוֹצֵאתָ֨ <WH3318> and thou shalt bring forth לָהֶ֥ם מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> to them water מִן־ <WH4480> out הַסֶּ֔לַע <WH5553> out of the rock וְהִשְׁקִיתָ֥ <WH8248> drink אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> the congregation וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּעִירָֽם׃ <WH1165> and their beasts

וַיִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> took מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּטֶּ֖ה <WH4294> the rod מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> from before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> he צִוָּֽהוּ׃ <WH6680> as he commanded

וַיַּקְהִ֜לוּ <WH6950> gathered מֹשֶׁ֧ה <WH4872> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֛ן <WH175> and Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> הַקָּהָ֖ל <WH6951> the congregation אֶל־ <WH413> together פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> together before הַסָּ֑לַע <WH5553> the rock וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and he said לָהֶ֗ם שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> unto them Hear נָא֙ <WH4994> now הַמֹּרִ֔ים <WH4784> now ye rebels הֲמִן־ <WH4480> at הַסֶּ֣לַע <WH5553> the rock הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> of this נוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> must we fetch לָכֶ֖ם מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> you water

וַיָּ֨רֶם <WH7311> lifted up מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֗וֹ <WH3027> his hand וַיַּ֧ךְ <WH5221> he smote אֶת־ <WH853> הַסֶּ֛לַע <WH5553> the rock בְּמַטֵּ֖הוּ <WH4294> and with his rod פַּעֲמָ֑יִם <WH6471> twice וַיֵּצְאוּ֙ <WH3318> came out מַ֣יִם <WH4325> and the water רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> abundantly וַתֵּ֥שְׁתְּ <WH8354> drank הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> and the congregation וּבְעִירָֽם׃ <WH1165> and their beasts ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and אַהֲרֹן֒ <WH175> and Aaron יַ֚עַן <WH3282> Because לֹא־ <WH3808> have not הֶאֱמַנְתֶּ֣ם <WH539> Because ye believed בִּ֔י לְהַ֨קְדִּישֵׁ֔נִי <WH6942> me not to sanctify לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> me in the eyes בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> therefore לֹ֤א <WH3808> shall not תָבִ֙יאוּ֙ <WH935> therefore ye shall not bring אֶת־ <WH853> הַקָּהָ֣ל <WH6951> this congregation הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> which I have given לָהֶֽם׃

הֵ֚מָּה <WH1992> This [is] מֵ֣י <WH4325> the water מְרִיבָ֔ה <WH4809> of Meribah אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> because רָב֥וּ <WH7378> strove בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> because the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH854> for יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God וַיִּקָּדֵ֖שׁ <WH6942> and he was sanctified בָּֽם׃ ס

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> sent מֹשֶׁ֧ה <WH4872> And Moses מַלְאָכִ֛ים <WH4397> messengers מִקָּדֵ֖שׁ <WH6946> from Kadesh אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king אֱד֑וֹם <WH123> of Edom כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אָחִ֣יךָ <WH251> thy brother יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You יָדַ֔עְתָּ <WH3045> Thou knowest אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַתְּלָאָ֖ה <WH8513> all the travail אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that מְצָאָֽתְנוּ׃ <WH4672> that hath befallen

וַיֵּרְד֤וּ <WH3381> went down אֲבֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH1> How our fathers מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <WH4714> into Egypt וַנֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> and we have dwelt בְּמִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> in Egypt יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> time רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> a long וַיָּרֵ֥עוּ <WH7489> vexed לָ֛נוּ מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4713> Egyptian וְלַאֲבֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH1> us and our fathers

וַנִּצְעַ֤ק <WH6817> And when we cried אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> he heard קֹלֵ֔נוּ <WH6963> our voice וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> and sent מַלְאָ֔ךְ <WH4397> an angel וַיֹּצִאֵ֖נוּ <WH3318> and hath brought us forth מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> now behold אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> we בְקָדֵ֔שׁ <WH6946> and behold we [are] in Kadesh עִ֖יר <WH5892> a city קְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> in the uttermost גְבוּלֶֽךָ׃ <WH1366> of thy border

נַעְבְּרָה־ <WH5674> Let us pass נָּ֣א <WH4994> Please בְאַרְצֶ֗ךָ <WH776> I pray thee through thy country לֹ֤א <WH3808> We will not נַעֲבֹר֙ <WH5674> we will not pass בְּשָׂדֶ֣ה <WH7704> through the fields וּבְכֶ֔רֶם <WH3754> or through the vineyards וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> even נִשְׁתֶּ֖ה <WH8354> neither will we drink מֵ֣י <WH4325> [of] the water בְאֵ֑ר <WH875> of the wells דֶּ֧רֶךְ <WH1870> [high] way הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> by the king's נֵלֵ֗ךְ <WH1980> will go לֹ֤א <WH3808> not נִטֶּה֙ <WH5186> we will not turn יָמִ֣ין <WH3225> to the right hand וּשְׂמֹ֔אול <WH8040> nor to the left עַ֥ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> after נַעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> until we have passed גְּבוּלֶֽךָ׃ <WH1366> thy borders

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> and אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> And Edom לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תַעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> unto him Thou shalt not pass בִּ֑י פֶּן־ <WH6435> or בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> thee with the sword אֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> by me lest I come out לִקְרָאתֶֽךָ׃ <WH7125> against

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> said אֵלָ֥יו <WH413> about בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of Israel בַּֽמְסִלָּ֣ה <WH4546> by the high way נַעֲלֶה֒ <WH5927> unto him We will go וְאִם־ <WH518> and if מֵימֶ֤יךָ <WH4325> of thy water נִשְׁתֶּה֙ <WH8354> drink אֲנִ֣י <WH589> and וּמִקְנַ֔י <WH4735> and if I and my cattle וְנָתַתִּ֖י <WH5414> will pay מִכְרָ֑ם <WH4377> price רַ֥ק <WH7535> but אֵין־ <WH369> without דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> for it I will only without [doing] any thing בְּרַגְלַ֥י <WH7272> on my feet אֶֽעֱבֹֽרָה׃ <WH5674> [else] go through

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תַעֲבֹ֑ר <WH5674> Thou shalt not go through וַיֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> came out אֱדוֹם֙ <WH123> And Edom לִקְרָאת֔וֹ <WH7125> against בְּעַ֥ם <WH5971> people כָּבֵ֖ד <WH3515> him with much וּבְיָ֥ד <WH3027> hand חֲזָקָֽה׃ <WH2389> and with a strong

וַיְמָאֵ֣ן ׀ <WH3985> refused אֱד֗וֹם <WH123> Thus Edom נְתֹן֙ <WH5414> to give אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel עֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> passage בִּגְבֻל֑וֹ <WH1366> through his border וַיֵּ֥ט <WH5186> turned away יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> wherefore Israel מֵעָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and פ

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> journeyed מִקָּדֵ֑שׁ <WH6946> from Kadesh וַיָּבֹ֧אוּ <WH935> and came בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> [even] the whole congregation הֹ֥ר <WH2023> Hor הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> unto mount

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> and Aaron בְּהֹ֣ר <WH2023> Hor הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> in mount עַל־ <WH5921> by גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> by the coast אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> of the land אֱד֖וֹם <WH123> of Edom לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

יֵאָסֵ֤ף <WH622> shall be gathered אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> Aaron אֶל־ <WH413> to his עַמָּ֔יו <WH5971> unto his people כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> shall not יָבֹא֙ <WH935> for he shall not enter אֶל־ <WH413> about הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> into the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> which I have given לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel עַ֛ל <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which מְרִיתֶ֥ם <WH4784> because ye rebelled against אֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֖י <WH6310> my word לְמֵ֥י <WH4325> at the water מְרִיבָֽה׃ <WH4809> of Meribah

קַ֚ח <WH3947> Take אֶֽת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> Aaron וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <WH499> and Eleazar בְּנ֑וֹ <WH1121> his son וְהַ֥עַל <WH5927> and bring them up אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> הֹ֥ר <WH2023> Hor הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> unto mount

וְהַפְשֵׁ֤ט <WH6584> And strip אֶֽת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> בְּגָדָ֔יו <WH899> of his garments וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֖ם <WH3847> and put אֶת־ <WH853> אֶלְעָזָ֣ר <WH499> them upon Eleazar בְּנ֑וֹ <WH1121> his son וְאַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> and Aaron יֵאָסֵ֖ף <WH622> shall be gathered וּמֵ֥ת <WH4191> [unto his people] and shall die שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there
